name: Night at the Beastro
description:
DOWNLOADING WINDOWS VERSION STRONGLY RECOMMENDED
If running HTML version anyways, please press F11 to go fullscreen

Controls: WASD, E  to interact, and hold down Q to use the Axe. Mix food ingredients in the bowl, and then give it to the customers

Night at the Beastro is an action/survival cooking game - where your job is to provide the right meals at a busy cafe, no matter how unusual the request.

Things may not go to plan at the Beastro but can you decide whether to please the normal customers, or let the restaurant go downhill for some unusual food requests, all while delivering the orders on time?

Manage your money to repair the damage, and try to keep the cafe running as long as possible!

Accompanied by a unique, quirky visual style and a funky swing- jazz track; this night will definitely be one to remember... 

Can you keep the cafe standing by the end of the night, when the customer is always right??

[Produced for the Wowie! Game Jam 2021, with the theme 'Failure is Progress']
